channel.title: Livestream
channel.description:
So I decided to make a Livestream, but I'm having issues with how I should host films. Uploading them to the server will just get my account closed, and it takes FOREVER. I'm not so sure about streaming to the server, I was wondering if there's a screen capture program that imitates a Webcam, so that Livestream will recognize it and allow me to stream.
I was also thinking about trying to stream using VLC. Is it possible to do? If so I have no idea how, and would greatly appreciate any help. But with streaming, quality can be bad. And my PC isn't so powerful in the processor department. Screen Recorders usually lag the shit out of my computer.
I also thought I could do it somehow with a program in linux. Is there any program like that?

item.title: Livestream
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:3, topic:290281”]Go on VLC.
Click Media.
Then Streaming.[/quote]

Why did you change your name? I liked it the old way.

Read full topic

item.title: Livestream
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:3, topic:290281”]Go on VLC.
Click Media.
Then Streaming.[/quote]

I know how to do that, it’s getting Livestream to accept the connection. As far as I know it doesn’t accept streams like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Livestream
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Go on VLC.
Click Media.
Then Streaming.
